page.title: 15Trade A Successful Business
page.content: The largest business in the village is Spencer Harris Builder's Merchant. It is a large shop and builders yard. The shop sells every kind of D-I-Y goods that can be imagined from hammers to electric saws and from nails to glue.The Builders yard is 500m. away from the shop.It stores sand,cement,drainpipes,bricks,timber, doors,windows and bathroom suites,in fact everything a builder might need. It attracts customers from all over S.Wales and advertises regularly in newspapers and magazines. Nine people are employed there. Five people to look after the shop and builders yard and four more are responsible for delivery of goods by lorry or van.It is one of the few businesses that attracts customers from outside the village.
